en: Basketball team at C.C.C. Co. 496 TVA-29 at Lexington, Tennessee

This photograph shows the basketball team of Civilian Conservation Corps, Company 496 TVA-29 at Lexington, Tennessee. The back of the photo lists the people as: Front row, left to right - James W. Tonn, Earl Noogen, Bogg A. Robinson, L.W. Kinkead, Roy Goodwin, Charles Carson ; and standing Earl Phillips, James Runnels, Slover Thorton, Randall Sims, Mack Wilson, Roy Marshall and Hillard Armstrong. The photography was produced by Spencer and Wyckoff of Detroit, Michigan and donated by Walter R. Hart.
Tennessee Valley Authority and "grass roots democracy"
